content.rendered:
German RepRap X1000 FDM 3D Printer

The new x1000 3D Printer is being developed for printing large size objects or multi-object prints in industrial quality. Print protoypes, small series, casting cores or architecture or design objects big, fast and precise.

  • Large build envelope: 1000 x 800 x 600 mm / 39.4 x 32 x 23.6 in (W/D/H)
  • High process reliability
  • Important safety features for industrial use
  • Special ventilation for high-quality prints
  • Network compatible (Wifi, Ethernet)
  • Draft-Mode

contact us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent St,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.

Send a Message

    Are you uploading files larger than 5mb?
    Upload Large File

    Do you want a quote based on your STL?
    Instant Quote Calculator


    (Accepted filetypes: pdf,jpg,jpeg,png & gif. Max file size: 5mb)

    High process reliability for industrial demands

    With its print volume of 1000 x 800 x 600 mm (X / Y / Z), the x1000 is the largest 3D printer with a closed building chamber, made in Germany. It was especially developed for industrial use and therefore has many safety features. The professional ventilation system ensures high-quality printing results.

    Large, closed build envelope with safety-door switch

    The closed build envelope avoids poor quality prints due to air flow. An automatic door locking mechanism keeps the hatch closed during the printing process for improved safety.

    Important safety feature for industrial use

    The x1000 optionally includes a closed switchboard, an emergency shut-down and a twofold CO2 fire extinguishing system.

    Simplify3D Software

    One integrated software suite contains everything you need to print high quality parts. Customizable settings and advanced processes put the controls into your hands. Support for dual-extruders, multi-part printing and even multiple processes within one part. Included in scope of delivery.

    Fast and precise printing

    A minimum layer high from 0.1 mm allow precise prints. You just need a draft or a less precise object: Simply use a 1 mm nozzle for quick and fast printing.

    Filament-Management

    Two sensor filament control prevents useless prints due to filament run out.

    Filetransfer

    The x1000 is network compatible via Wifi or Ethernet.

    On Site Service

    The x1000 is designed to be easy to maintain. We also offer on-site service for maintenance and installation.

    Stand-Alone Printing

    The big touchscreen allows intuitive operation of the printer and makes it easy to start any print job.

    Direct Drive DD3 Extruder with Full Metal Hotend

    New extruder technology, no adjustment necessary, variable contact pressure. High-heatable hotend (up to 290° C / 554° F) for industrial filaments. Hotends can be exchanged quick and easily.

    Specifications

    Build envelope*(XxYxZ) 1000 x 800 x 600 mm / 39.4 x 32 x 23.6 in
    Print speed 10 – 150 mm/s
    Travel speed 10 – 300 mm/s
    Layer height (min) 0.1 mm (depends on nozzle)
    Filament / Nozzle diameter(standard) 1.75 mm / 0.8 mm
    Available Nozzles 0.4 / 0.6 mm
    Filament* PLA, Performance PLA, Laywood, PVA, PET-G, TPU64D,  / / ABS,  PC, and others experimental
    Options Heated print bed, DD3 dual extruder, CO2 fire extinguishing system
    File transfer LC Touch Display, network based printing via Wifi, Ethernet
    Software Simplify3D
    Power consumption (max) 2500 W
    Operating voltage* 3phase current 400V (CEE 3L+N+PE)
    Dimensions(BxTxH) 1725 x 1500 x 1320 mm / 67.9 x 59.0 x 52 in
    Weight ca. 400 kg / 881.85 lbs
    Technology FFF (Fused Filament Fabrication)

    • German RepRap X1000
      German RepRap X1000 FDM 3D Printer The new x1000 3D Printer is being developed for printing large size...
      Read More

    Want To Know More?

    Our team of 3D printing professionals are just an email or a phone call away.
